summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2535 for the improvement of East Alder Street from Thirteenth Avenue to Twenty-third Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of concrete walks and providing for the necessary drainage under Ordinance No. 29423, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
